questions.question: This arc is centered on a prison fortress in the Calm Belt and features Luffy's attempt to rescue his brother, Portgas D. Ace. What is...?
This arc takes the Straw Hat Pirates to a sky island where they face off against a self-proclaimed God with lightning powers. What is...?
This arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates' involvement in a rebellion against a tyrant king on an island in the sky. What is...?
This form of Haki allows the user to predict an opponent's moves and sense their presence, even if they are hidden. What is...?
This technique, used by a certain pirate captain, involves creating a giant spectral elephant. What is...?
questions.answer: Zou Zou no Mi, Model: Mammoth

questions.question: This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to turn themselves and anything they touch invisible. What is...?
This princess of the Alabasta Kingdom travels with the Straw Hat Pirates and wields the power of the Flower-Flower Fruit. Who is...?
This character, originally from Drum Island, is noted for his blue-nose and ability to shapeshift. Who is...?
This character is the leader of the Whitebeard Pirates and was known as the 'Strongest Man in the World'. Who is...?
